name: Blinko
description: Blinko is a self-hosted note-taking and knowledge management application that helps you capture, organize, and retrieve your thoughts and ideas efficiently.
author: blinkospace

form_fields.label: NextAuth Secret
form_fields.hint: A secure secret key for NextAuth authentication. Must be at least 32 characters long.

form_fields.label: NextAuth URL
form_fields.hint: Set this if you want to use SSO or have a custom domain (e.g., https://your-domain.com)

form_fields.label: Base URL
form_fields.hint: Public base URL for the application (e.g., https://your-domain.com)
